description:
APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED CONVERSION OF ROOFSPACE WITH JULIET BALCONY, NEW WINDOW, 2X SKYLIGHTS AND 7X PV SOLAR PANELS. CREATION OF
AN OUTBUILDING TO REAR GARDEN. NEW FRONT DOOR PROPOSED WITH SIDELIGHT, NEW FENESTRATION, ADDIDTION OF EXTERNAL INSULATION, EXTERNAL MATERIAL TO MATCH EXISTING.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, erection of a rear dormer roof extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, installation of one rooflight to the front roof slope, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, erection of an outbuilding to the rear garden of the dwellinghouse, would consist of the erection of an outbuilding for uses incidental to that of the main house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The operations, installation of seven Photovoltaic Solar Panels to the front roof slope, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 14 of Schedule 2 of the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 5 - The operations comprising external wall insulation would consist of the improvement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant should be aware that the air conditioning unit or air source heat pump to the rear elevation requires planning permission and has not been considered under this Lawful Development Certificate application.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE
Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a Lawful Development Certificate only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.
